features: SAFETY AND HIGH QUALITY: Toddler toys for young kids include high-quality, chunky wooden pieces to ensure tiny hands can easily grasp the pieces and complete the stacking puzzle. The edges of montessori toy are smooth and the pegs are sturdy, blocks are covered with food safe paint that are non-toxic, odorless and anti-fade, it keeps your 1 2 3 years old boys and girls play safely. Your children will love the large, thick pieces of this toddler toy, which are easy to handle and put together.

LEARNING THROUGH PLAY: This wooden sorting and stacking puzzle contains 20 pieces including blocks of 5 colors and 4 geometric shapes.It feeds the developing minds of young kids, helping them practice fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and problem-solving. This puzzle also provides good opportunity for furthering verbal skills with colors, count, and shapes and inspiring imaginative adventures in young kids.

DESIGN FOR TODDLERS: Our montessori toyis an easy game that involves mounting one piece on top of the another piece. The geometric blocks have the same size but different colors and shapes. While stacking the blocks, children need to sit and balance core muscles to move hands freely and figure out which shape fits where. This kind of activity will help your toddlers to control their body movement and learn shape and geometry, build color recognition and exercise kids’space conception.

IDEAL GIFTS FOR AGES 1-3 AND UP:The learning toys makes a great gift for kids 1-3 and up. Add the toddler puzzles to round out the hands-on play experience and give kids another engaging option for screen-free fun, it makes a great break from electronics.

HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: Customer satisfaction is our greatest motivation, we produce developmental stacking toys to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a message and we’ll make it right.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: More Than Just a Puzzle This wooden sorting and stacking puzzle contains 20 pieces including blocks of 5 colors and 4 geometric shapes. It feeds the developing minds of young kids, helping them practice fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and problem-solving. This puzzle also provides good opportunity for furthering verbal skills with colors, count, and shapes and inspiring imaginative adventures in young kids. Experts say the best toys are those that encourage interaction. Our montessori toys are designed to inspire engagement and connection with your child. Sorting & Stacking Toys is an exceptional way for kids to develop cognitive, physical, and emotional skills. As children work at solving the decorative and themed puzzles, they are also developing hand-eye coordination along with fine and gross motor skills. The Wooden Sorting & Stacking Toys is 11.3 x 2.3 x 2.2 in, toddler toys for young kids include high-quality, chunky wooden pieces to ensure tiny hands can easily grasp the pieces and complete the stacking puzzle. It's a ideal toys for 1 2 3 years old boys girls. Please Pay Attention: 1. Keep the puzzles dry, do not touch water for a long time or soak in water. 2. As the materials of toddler puzzles are made of wood, please keep away from heat and fire. 3. Avoid directly washing, please wipe the wooden puzzles with a damp cloth when they get wet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great hand eye coordination builder
reviews.reviewText: Our granddaughter isn't quit 2 and she loves to play with this. It seems sturdy and is easy for snake hands to manipulate. Good learning toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Skill Builder
reviews.reviewText: My daughter (15mo) and Godson (2&1/2) love this little puzzle. It’s sturdy and held up to daily use since I got it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My toddler loves it
reviews.reviewText: I was in search of something educational to keep my busy toddler engaged and excited at the same time. He loves this product and enjoys learning with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars not a bad toy
reviews.reviewText: Very nice product, no such attractive to the baby

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars He Loved It!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my grandson who is a year and a half old. He loved the bright colors. It took him a minute to figure out how to align the pieces but once he did, he was so proud of himself. As was I! All kids need toys that teach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toddler gift
reviews.reviewText: This toy is a great gift for a toddler. I bought it for my daughter and she loves playing with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 20 month old grandson loves this board. I showed him how to do it once and he fugitives out from there. He plays with it all the time! Is a great learning toy and the price was great also! I definitely recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best quality, not well made
reviews.reviewText: Really wanted to get this to help my little one learn colors and shapes and some of the pegs were loose before he was able to even use it. Some have already fallen out. Still like the product just wish the craftsmanship was a little better
